title: Chat with No Limits Host John Krull
googleplay:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: For the first time in Film Soceyology history, Matthew replays his epic chat (in its entirety) with No Limits host John Krull (whose show concluded July 2019) about the entire Elvis Presley film catalog. Special appearance by former FS intern Makenna Mays.
